title: AI Integration - BYOK (Bring Your Own Key) Implementation Plan

executive_summary.overview: Implement AI features where users provide their own API keys. Each user stores encrypted keys, pays for their own usage, and enjoys seamless AI features.
executive_summary.user_cost: $0.01-$2.00/month per user (they pay directly to Anthropic/Perplexity)
executive_summary.your_cost: $0 for AI (only Supabase Edge Function invocations, within free tier)
executive_summary.modularity: Fully modular - can be enabled/disabled globally or per-user
executive_summary.security: Keys encrypted client-side, decrypted server-side in Edge Functions only

key_storage.method: Plain text in Supabase database (user_ai_keys table)

key_storage.access_control: RLS policies - users can only access their own keys

help_section.title: Where do I get API keys?
help_section.anthropic:
1. Go to console.anthropic.com
2. Create account or sign in
3. Navigate to API Keys
4. Create new key
5. Copy key starting with 'sk-ant-api03-'
help_section.perplexity:
1. Go to perplexity.ai/settings/api
2. Create account or sign in
3. Generate API key
4. Copy key starting with 'pplx-'

faq.a1: Yes. Your keys are encrypted before storage and only decrypted server-side when making API calls. They're never exposed to other users.
faq.q2: How much will AI features cost me?
faq.a2: Typical usage costs $0.01-$0.20/month. You pay Anthropic/Perplexity directly based on your usage.
faq.q3: Can I remove my API keys?
faq.a3: Yes, anytime. Go to Settings ‚Üí AI Features ‚Üí Manage Keys ‚Üí Delete.
faq.q4: What happens if I don't add API keys?
faq.a4: AI features will be hidden. You can still use all other features of Noted normally.
faq.q5: Do you see my API keys?
faq.a5: No. Keys are encrypted before storage and only you can use them.
